channel.title: Monte Carlo String/M-theory Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content on Monte Carlo String/M-theory Collaboration

item.title: Metropolis algorithm
item.description: Metropolis is a basic algorithm to generate a Markov Chain for Monte Carlo methods. More details can be found at this link Metropolis.pdf. For example, we include and explain some basic sample code for performing a Gaussian integral in C or Fortran90

item.title: Hybrid Monte Carlo algorithm
item.description: Hybrid Monte Carlo (HMC) can also be used. Coming Soon…
